item.description:
After-Hours Movie Night at PRANA
"The Botany of Desire"

15% Off all Smoothies and Desserts!

While visiting places like Peru, Kazakhstan and Amsterdam, author Michael Pollan explores the natural history of apples, tulips, marijuana and potatoes and part of their intricate relationship with human beings. Based on Pollan's best-selling book, this documentary encourages viewers to look at the world from a vastly different perspective and improve their relationships with nature.

This film is meant to bring people together in a spirit of community and encourage discussion. The views of the writer, director, and actors do not necessarily reflect the views of Prana's owners or staff. The film discusses marijuana which is still illegal in many of the United States. It also discusses potatoes, tulips, and apples, which seem to garner less publicity than marijuana yet, as this film seeks to show, also have profound effects on humans and our culture.

Have the best day ever!

Namaste!

Taylor & Philippe

EatAtPrana.com

"Until further notice, celebrate everything."
item.name: After-Hours Movie & 15% Off Smoothies & Deserts @ Prana
